titles.title: Justice for Rape Survivors Act
Justice for Rape Survivors Act
To require mandatory minimums for sexual abuse.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Justice for Rape Survivors Act
This bill establishes a 30-year statutory mandatory minimum prison term for the following federal sexual abuse offenses:
causing another person to engage in a sexual act by using force against that person or by threatening or placing that person in fear,engaging in or attempting to engage in a sexual act with another person by rendering the other person unconscious or intoxicated,causing or attempting to cause another person to engage in a sexual act by threatening or placing that person in fear,engaging or attempting to engage in a sexual act if the other person is incapacitated, andengaging or attempting to engage in a sexual act without the other person's consent.
